projects.name: Multimodal Art Projection (M-A-P)
projects.summary: The community members are working on research topics in a wide range of spectrum, including but not limited to pre-training paradigm of foundation models, large-scale data collection and processing, and the derived applciations on coding, reasoning and music creativity.
